subject: Public Speaking
title: Surprise and Dopamine
description: A short lesson to help you apply Surprise and Dopamine.

hook.text: Surprise triggers dopamine release. Dopamine creates memory.

buildup.text: Unexpected information gets more attention and better recall.

discovery.text: A surprising fact in the middle of a speech wakes everyone up.

twist.text: Predictable speeches are forgotten. Surprising ones stick.

climax.text: Build in at least one genuine surprise per speech.

punchline.text: Surprise them. Their brains will thank you.
